configItem.name: genius
configItem.description: Genius Comfy KB-16M / Genius MM Keyboard KWD-910

configItem.name: logitech_g15
configItem.description: Logitech G15 extra keys via G15daemon

configItem.name: logiinkse
configItem.description: Logitech iTouch Internet Navigator Keyboard SE

configItem.name: logiinkseusb
configItem.description: Logitech iTouch Internet Navigator Keyboard SE (USB)

configItem.name: logiultraxc
configItem.description: Logitech Ultra-X Cordless Media Desktop Keyboard

configItem.name: microsoftpro
configItem.description: Microsoft Natural Keyboard Pro / Microsoft Internet Keyboard Pro

configItem.name: microsoftprousb
configItem.description: Microsoft Natural Keyboard Pro USB / Microsoft Internet Keyboard Pro

configItem.name: dvorak-ucw
configItem.description: US Dvorak with CZ UCW support

configItem.name: bepo_latin9
configItem.description: Bepo, ergonomic, Dvorak way, latin-9 only

configItem.name: ro_nodeadkeys
configItem.description: Romanian keyboard with German letters, eliminate dead keys

configItem.name: dvorak_quotes
configItem.description: Dvorak, Polish quotes on quotemark key

configItem.name: ast
configItem.description: Asturian variant with bottom-dot H and bottom-dot L

configItem.name: grp:caps_switch
configItem.description: Caps Lock (while pressed), Alt+Caps Lock does the original capslock action

configItem.name: grp:shift_caps_switch
configItem.description: Caps Lock (to first layout), Shift+Caps Lock (to last layout)

configItem.name: grp:win_menu_switch
configItem.description: Left Win (to first layout), Right Win/Menu (to last layout)

configItem.name: grp:lctrl_rctrl_switch
configItem.description: Left Ctrl (to first layout), Right Ctrl (to last layout)

configItem.name: lv3:ralt_switch_multikey
configItem.description: Right Alt, Shift+Right Alt key is Multi_Key

configItem.name: lv3:ralt_alt
configItem.description: Right Alt key never chooses 3rd level

configItem.name: lv3:caps_switch_latch
configItem.description: Caps Lock (chooses 3rd level, latches when pressed together with another 3rd-level-chooser)

configItem.name: lv3:bksl_switch_latch
configItem.description: Backslash chooses 3rd level, latches when pressed together with another 3rd-level-chooser)

configItem.name: lv3:lsgt_switch_latch
configItem.description: <Less/Greater> (chooses 3rd level, latches when pressed together with another 3rd-level-chooser)

configItem.name: ctrl:nocaps
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Ctrl

configItem.name: ctrl:ctrl_menu
configItem.description: Right Ctrl is mapped to Menu

configItem.name: grp_led
configItem.description: Use keyboard LED to show alternative layout

configItem.name: keypad:future
configItem.description: Unicode additions (arrows and math operators). Math operators on default level

configItem.name: keypad:oss_wang
configItem.description: Wang 724 keypad with unicode additions (arrows and math operators)

configItem.name: keypad:future_wang
configItem.description: Wang 724 keypad with unicode additions (arrows and math operators). Math operators on default level

configItem.name: kpdl:dotoss_latin9
configItem.description: Four-level key with dot, latin-9 restriction

configItem.name: caps:internal
configItem.description: Caps Lock uses internal capitalization. Shift "pauses" Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:internal_nocancel
configItem.description: Caps Lock uses internal capitalization. Shift doesn't affect Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:shift
configItem.description: Caps Lock acts as Shift with locking. Shift "pauses" Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:shift_nocancel
configItem.description: Caps Lock acts as Shift with locking. Shift doesn't affect Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:capslock
configItem.description: Caps Lock toggles normal capitalization of alphabetic characters

configItem.name: caps:numlock
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Num Lock

configItem.name: caps:escape
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional ESC

configItem.name: caps:backspace
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Backspace

configItem.name: caps:super
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Super

configItem.name: caps:hyper
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Hyper

configItem.name: caps:shiftlock
configItem.description: Caps Lock toggles Shift so all keys are affected

configItem.name: altwin:menu
configItem.description: Add the standard behavior to Menu key

configItem.name: altwin:meta_alt
configItem.description: Alt and Meta are on Alt keys

configItem.name: altwin:ctrl_win
configItem.description: Control is mapped to Win keys (and the usual Ctrl keys)

configItem.name: altwin:ctrl_alt_win
configItem.description: Control is mapped to Alt keys, Alt is mapped to Win keys

configItem.name: altwin:meta_win
configItem.description: Meta is mapped to Win keys

configItem.name: altwin:left_meta_win
configItem.description: Meta is mapped to Left Win

configItem.name: altwin:alt_super_win
configItem.description: Alt is mapped to Right Win, Super to Menu

configItem.name: altwin:swap_lalt_lwin
configItem.description: Left Alt is swapped with Left Win

configItem.name: numpad:mac
configItem.description: Numeric keypad keys work as with Mac

configItem.name: numpad:microsoft
configItem.description: Shift with numeric keypad keys works as in MS Windows

configItem.name: numpad:shift3
configItem.description: Shift does not cancel Num Lock, chooses 3rd level instead

configItem.name: srvrkeys:none
configItem.description: Special keys (Ctrl+Alt+<key>) handled in a server

configItem.name: apple:alupckeys
configItem.description: Apple Aluminium Keyboard: emulate PC keys (Print, Scroll Lock, Pause, Num Lock)

configItem.name: shift:both_capslock
configItem.description: Both Shift-Keys together toggle Caps Lock

configItem.name: shift:both_capslock_cancel
configItem.description: Both Shift-Keys together activate Caps Lock, one Shift-Key deactivates

configItem.name: lv5:lsgt_switch_lock
configItem.description: <Less/Greater> chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser

configItem.name: lv5:ralt_switch_lock
configItem.description: Right Alt chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser

configItem.name: lv5:lwin_switch_lock
configItem.description: Left Win chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser

configItem.name: lv5:rwin_switch_lock
configItem.description: Right Win chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser

configItem.name: lv5:lsgt_switch_lock_cancel
configItem.description: <Less/Greater> chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser, one press releases the lock

configItem.name: lv5:ralt_switch_lock_cancel
configItem.description: Right Alt chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser, one press releases the lock

configItem.name: lv5:lwin_switch_lock_cancel
configItem.description: Left Win chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser, one press releases the lock

configItem.name: lv5:rwin_switch_lock_cancel
configItem.description: Right Win chooses 5th level, locks when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser, one press releases the lock

configItem.name: lv5:lsgt_switch_lock_cancel
configItem.description: <Less/Greater> chooses 5th level and activates level5-Lock when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser, one press releases the lock

configItem.name: lv5:ralt_switch_lock_cancel
configItem.description: Right Alt chooses 5th level and activates level5-Lock when pressed together with another 5th-level-chooser, one press releases the lock

configItem.name: nbsp
configItem.description: Using space key to input non-breakable space character

configItem.name: nbsp:level2
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at second level

configItem.name: nbsp:level3
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at third level

configItem.name: nbsp:level3s
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at third level, nothing at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:level3n
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at third level, thin non-breakable space character at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:level4
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:level4n
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at fourth level, thin non-breakable space character at sixth level

configItem.name: nbsp:level4nl
configItem.description: Non-breakable space character at fourth level, thin non-breakable space character at sixth level (via Ctrl+Shift)

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2zwj3
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level, zero-width joiner character at third level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2zwj3nb4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level, zero-width joiner character at third level, non-breakable space character at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level, non-breakable space character at third level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3s
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level, non-breakable space character at third level, nothing at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3zwj4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level, non-breakable space character at third level, zero-width joiner at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3nnb4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at second level, non-breakable space character at third level, thin non-breakable space at fourth level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj3zwj4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner character at third level, zero-width joiner at fourth level

configItem.name: esperanto:qwerty
configItem.description: To the corresponding key in a Qwerty keyboard.

configItem.name: esperanto:dvorak
configItem.description: To the corresponding key in a Dvorak keyboard.

configItem.name: terminate
configItem.description: Key sequence to kill the X server
